name: Doom Work
description:
Some greedy businessmen decided to destroy the forest, to create the construction of a giant building. And with this several animals were expelled from their homes, seeing this, their role will be to prevent this construction from continuing, eliminating all the robots in the area and thus managing to save the forest.

  • 50 stages with more than 8 mechanics!
  • Different ways to beat each stage!
  • Different ways to eliminate each enemy!
